Title: Mozilla Firefox: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Mozilla Firefox, the
    worst of which could result in the arbitrary execution of code.

Background.Text: Mozilla Firefox is a popular open-source web browser from the Mozilla Project.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Mozilla Firefox. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to view a specially crafted web page, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Mozilla Firefox ESR users should upgrade to the latest version:
